an4.108:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro balibaddupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.108:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacando hoti, no paragavacando?
an4.108:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisam ubbejeta hoti, no paraparisam.
an4.108:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacando hoti, no paragavacando.
an4.108:2.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, balibaddo sagavacando, no paragavacando;
an4.108:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacando hoti, no sagavacando?
an4.108:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo paraparisam ubbejeta hoti, no sakaparisam.
an4.108:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacando hoti, no sagavacando.
an4.108:3.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, balibaddo paragavacando, no sagavacando;
an4.108:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacando ca hoti paragavacando ca?
an4.108:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisam ubbejeta hoti paraparisanca.
an4.108:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacando ca hoti paragavacando ca.
an4.108:4.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, balibaddo sagavacando ca paragavacando ca;
an4.108:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacando hoti no paragavacando?
an4.108:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva sakaparisam ubbejeta hoti, no paraparisanca.
an4.108:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacando hoti, no paragavacando.
an4.108:5.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, balibaddo neva sagavacando, no paragavacando;
an4.108:5.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro balibaddupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
